Bakersfield.Wible Orchard, California:
Wible Orchard (formerly, Wible and Wible Orchards) is an unincorporated community in Kern County, California. It is located on the Southern Pacific Railroad 4.25 miles (6.8 km) south-southwest of Bakersfield, at an elevation of 377 feet (115 m).
The name honors Simon William Wible, who settled in Kern County in 1874.
